# Create a derivative expression ----
der1 <- D(expr = expression(x^2), name = "x")
der1

x <- 3
eval(der1)

der2 <- D(expr = expression(2 * (3 * a + 2)^4 - 5), name = "a")
der2

a <- 1.2
eval(der2)
